overview: Mr. Schorer is a proven executive with an exceptional blend of strategic, analytic, business and leadership skills. He has over 20 years of experience in the mobile, information services, and digital marketing industries. Under his role as President, Mr. Schorer has the oversight responsibilities to define and lead the Company’s strategic direction while executing business development objectives. Prior to founding Digital Segment, Mr. Schorer served as a Senior Vice President, Marketing and Business Development, for VoltDelta Resources, a $200 million division of Volt Information Sciences that provides directory assistance, voice automation, and wireless applications to the global telecommunications market. As a member of the senior executive team for VoltDelta, Mr. Schorer set business product strategy and strategic marketing direction for the company. Mr. Schorer also had executive roles with Go2 and Sprint PCS.
